p: Main chemical constituents: The major phytoconstituents of W. somnifera are isopellertierine, anferine, withanolides, withaferins, sitoindoside VII and VIII and withanoloides. Other chemical compounds are withanine, somniferine, somnine, somniferinine, withananine, pseudo-withanine, tropine, pseudo-tropine, 3-a-gloyloxytropane, choline and cuscohygrine [ 149, 150, 151, 152].
